metaData.title: Accommodation Rosia Montana
metaData.description: Stay in a heritage house from the Historic Center of Roșia Montana, recently renovated with bathrooms and kitchen access. See also the hiking and bike trails to discover our area: roman galleries, gold mining industry, heritage buildings, mountains, lakes and many more. Rosia Montana, Alba, Apuseni Mountains, Transylvania - Romania.

specificArticles.textContent: We are located in the historic center of Rosia Montana 331. The building was a bank, medical center, cinema and then it was bought by our grandparents who work in mining industry, and used for living. It's a heritage building, so we preserved the painting, the wooden floor, the windows, the heating with terracotta stoves, but also new bathrooms and kitchen and after we open it for tourists. Te rooms have separate entries and a common yard with hammocks, green grass and a nice view to the Cânic massif - Rosia Montana accommodation - Transylvania accommodation.

specificArticles.textContent: We offer bikes for rent to discover Rosia Montana and the Apuseni mountains area (mountain bikes, asphalt or trekking plus safety gear and spare tube). If you come with your own bike we can offer (if needed) tools and bike repair assistance. To find out more about the places you visit or bike repairs on the trail, we can offer guided bike trails. The bookings can be make from the bellow form.

specificArticles.textContent: Our area has perfect places for biking here in Transylvania. More info, images, guides or online maps with gps data can be found on the

Rosia Montana has a golden past. How it worked the mining through galleries, pounds and other machines used to extract the gold, the past of the heritage buildings from the historic center or what would have been the impact of the mega mining project proposed here in 2007 by the canadian company and the massive streets protests against it, are just some of the main reasons we recommend to visit Roșia Montana with a guide. The locality is not arranged for tourism so it will be pretty difficult to see and find all this by your own.
If you want a guided We can offer guided tours - the bookings are made from the bellow form.

sections.text: How to reach us?

specificArticles.textContent:
We are in the historic center of Roșia Montană - Carpathian Mountains - Transylvania, 130km away from Cluj Napoca and 80km from Alba Iulia. You can reach us by:
car - set on your google maps gps 'Casa Petri Rosia Montana' and it will bring you to our house.
bus - the closest bus stations are in Câmpeni (15 km) or Abrud (10 km), but ask the driver to drop you off in Gura Roșiei (6 km) and hitchhike to the historic center.
train - the closest train station is in Alba Iulia. Beside is the bus station so you can take a bus from there.
airplane - the closest airport is in Cluj Napoca. From here you have to take a bus.
Once in the historic center of Rosia Montana you will see on the left a 3 floor block of flats (the only block from the market). So take it on the left beside this building and in front you will see our house (one floor white house). The entrance is through the yard on the left of the house. Please call us before arriving (~30min).
